On the Wednesday edition of Breitbart News Daily, broadcast live on SiriusXM Patriot Channel 125 from 6AM to 9AM Eastern, Breitbart Editor-in-Chief Alex Marlow will continue our discussion of the issues animating the 2016 election, as GOP nominee Donald Trump surges in the polls.

Peter Schweizer — author of the bestselling book Clinton Cash, which is the basis of the documentary film and new graphic novel of the same name — will weigh in on the latest revelations in the WikiLeaks documents and FBI investigations of the Clintons and their allies.

SiriusXM Vice President for news and talk Dave Gorab called the show “the conservative news show of record.”

Follow Breitbart News on Twitter for live updates during the show.
Eric Trump’s wife, Lara Trump, will discuss the “Women for Trump” tour she is participating in and explain why her father-in-law is better for women voters than Hillary.
Gabrielle Jackson Bosche, author of 5 Millennial Myths and The Millennial Entrepreneur, will discuss Trump’s support among evangelical women voters.
Frank Gaffney of the Center for Security Policy will discuss the latest foreign policy revelations from the WikiLeaks documents.
Live from London, Rome, and Jerusalem, Breitbart correspondents will provide updates on the latest international news.
Breitbart News Daily is the first live, conservative radio enterprise to air seven days a week.
He’ll be joined by Breitbart’s Joel Pollak reporting live from the campaign trail with Trump.
Veteran pollster Pat Caddell will break down the latest polls for us.
Listeners may call into the show at: 866-957-2874.
